verbs.description: [ARG0: Secretary of State Mike Pompeo] [V: says] [ARG1: that Trump will offer North Korea opportunities to work with Americans and American companies instead of economic aid in exchange for complete denuclearization when he meets Kim Jong - un at next month ’s summit] .

Secretary of State Mike Pompeo says that Trump [V: will] offer North Korea opportunities to work with Americans and American companies instead of economic aid in exchange for complete denuclearization when he meets Kim Jong - un at next month ’s summit .

Secretary of State Mike Pompeo says that [ARG0: Trump] [ARGM-MOD: will] [V: offer] [ARG3: North Korea] [ARG1: opportunities to work with Americans and American companies instead of economic aid] [ARGM-PRP: in exchange for complete denuclearization] [ARGM-TMP: when he meets Kim Jong - un at next month ’s summit] .

Secretary of State Mike Pompeo says that Trump will offer [ARG0: North Korea] opportunities to [V: work] [ARG3: with Americans and American companies] instead of economic aid in exchange for complete denuclearization when he meets Kim Jong - un at next month ’s summit .
